description: This is the entry point file for a React application. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component. It creates a root to render the application within an HTML element with id 'root' and mounts the App component within React.StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render React components into a DOM node.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders a React element into the specified root.
